item.title: 操作指南
item.description: Process 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 $ hugo new post/XXX/.../YYY.md * the new blog (md) will stay in content/post/XXX/.../YYY.md * * the new blog (html) will stay in public/post/XXX/.../index.html * > edit YYY.md $ hugo -D * -D means publish all blogs containing drafts. * $ cd public $ git add . Based on MarkdownPreview test.md. Markdown 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 # H1
